title: The Symptoms of Deceptive Speech
description:
A lot is said about the importance of honesty, but a lot of what’s said isn’t all that honestand that’s not just true in political campaigns. Join Dr. Tony Evans as he talks about the danger in the lies we’re told and the lies we tellpart of his powerful series, Watch Your Mouth.

To support this ministry financially, visit: https://www.oneplace.com/donate/222/29
itunes:author: Dr. Tony Evans
